recipeIngredient: 5 grams of finely ground and decarboxylated marijuana

text.content: Melt 130 grams of butter over low heat. Add 5 grams of finely ground and decarboxylated marijuana.
Filter the infused butter into a bowl.
Add 120 grams of sugar and 2 eggs to the filtered butter, beat well. Incorporate 250 grams of flour and 1 pinch of salt, mix until a compact dough is obtained.
Cover the dough with cling film and refrigerate. Preheat the oven to 140 degrees Celsius.
Form balls with the cold dough and flatten them on a baking tray lined with parchment paper.
Bake in the preheated oven for about 15 minutes, or until the edges are golden.
